#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int count,i,l;
	char a[100000];
	while(scanf("%s",&a)!=EOF)
	{
		
        
		l=strlen(a);
		count=1;
		for(i=0;i<(l);i++)
		{
			if(a[i]==a[i+1])
			{
				count++;
			}
			else if((a[i]!=a[i+1]))
			{
				if(count>3)
				{
					printf("%d!%c",count,a[i]);
				}
				else if(count==2)
				{
					printf("%c%c",a[i],a[i]);
				}
				else if(count==3)
				printf("%c%c%c",a[i],a[i],a[i]);
				else
				printf("%c",a[i]);
				count=1;
			}
			else if(a[i+1]=='\0')
			{
				if(count>3)
				{
					printf("%d!%c",count,a[i]);
				}
				else if(count==2)
				{
					printf("%c%c",a[i],a[i]);
				}
				else if(count==3)
				printf("%c%c%c",a[i],a[i],a[i]);
				else
				printf("%c",a[i]);
			}
			
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
